vlive.korean: [Q. 폭군이었지만 결국 모든 것을 잃은 루이에게 연민을 느낀다는 리뷰가 많았는데, 산들은 어땠나요?] [Q. There were a lot of reviews feeling sympathy to Louis who lost everything, how was it for you?] View video B1A4 : [BABA Special Clip] Goodbye! Louis And Philippe
vlive.english: [Q. There were a lot of reviews feeling sympathy to Louis who lost everything, how was it for you?]

examples.korean: a father tyrannizing his children 발음듣기 자녀에게 폭군같이 구는 아버지 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a father tyrannizing his children 발음

examples.korean: His boss is a complete tyrant. 발음듣기 그의 사장은 완전 폭군이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His boss is a complete tyrant. 발음

examples.korean: The country was ruled by a succession of tyrants. 발음듣기 그 나라는 세습 폭군들에 의해 다스려졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The country was ruled by a succession of tyrants. 발음

examples.korean: a pitiless killer / tyrant 발음듣기 인정사정없는 살인자/폭군 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Cruel leaders are replaced only to have new leaders turn cruel. (Ernesto "Che" Guevara) 발음듣기 폭군은 폭군으로 변할 새 지도자로 대체될 뿐이다. (체 게바라, 명예명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Cruel leaders are replaced only to have new leaders turn cruel. (Ernesto "Che" Guevara) 발음
